mapper.select: select title,seq from meeting_table where seq in (select seq from applicant_table where user_id =#{user_id});
select title,seq from meeting_table where user_id = #{user_id};
select group_name from group_table where group_id in (select group_id from group_user_table where user_id = #{user_id});
select title,seq,contents from meeting_table where end = "진행" and hidden = "공개" order by hits desc limit 0,5;
